# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth more than what you're paying, considering its market value is $10,000. I'm confident it will significantly contribute to your business growth. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
